alert.note: Alert for Liberty; Toole (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 5:22PM MDT until July 08 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Great Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Liberty County in north central Montana... Northeastern Toole County in north central Montana... * Until 600 PM MDT. * At 522 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 15 miles east of Sunburst, or 25 miles northeast of Shelby, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Liberty and northeastern Toole Counties. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
